questions.question: How would you rate your overall mood today? (Very positive, somewhat positive, neutral, somewhat negative, very negative).
Did you experience any physical pain today? If yes, please rate the pain on a scale from 1 to 10.
Around how many hours of sleep did you get last night?
Did you feel rested upon waking up this morning?
Have you felt unusually tired or fatigued today? (Not at all, a little bit, moderately, very much, or extremely).
Did you experience any anxiety or nervousness today? (Not at all, a little bit, moderately, very much, or extremely).
Have you felt restless or unable to sit still today? (Not at all, a little bit, moderately, very much, or extremely).
How would you rate your concentration today? (Very good, good, average, poor, or very poor).
Did you take any medications today? If yes, did you take them as prescribed?
Are there any other symptoms or feelings you experienced today that you would like to note?
